title: What are the responsibility of a father towards his teenager daughter? - Quora

response.answer_text: Understand that your daughter is going through harmonal changesUnderstand your daughter will expirience attraction, infatuation and heartbreaksUnderstand it okay to expirience such things at this ageGuide her wellBe her freind and understand her, inspite of being a bodyguard she is scared ofHer body is going through too many changes. Make sure her health is in good position mentally as well physicallyTry to know her problems and solve them with your experienceBe the one she can share her problems withBe so Frank with her that she can share anything she wantsLet her understand her passion and plus points and help her choose a goalGet her admitted for self defence classesEncourage her to travel by public transport and cycleTell her she need not be scared of anyoneTeach her to fight back for her rightsHelp her in understanding money managementKnow her circle wellMotivate her to develop one good hobbyEncourage her to read more and more and develop knowledge in all horizonsSupport her to take a standLet her learn to manage her life, take care of her things, learn basic skills for survivalMake her understand she needs not be dependent on anyone because she is a girl
